Sheet1.Event: Members of the BOG arrive at the venue. HoDs and Senators assemble in the green room at the backside of  Auditorium Hall
Arrival  of  the  Chief  Guest  (He  will  be  received  by  the  Director  and ushered for robing)
The Director will introduce the Chief Guest and the members of the BOG to HoDs and Senators
Academic Procession starts from the lobby of the Auditorium
Academic Procession enters the Convocation Hall
Invocation (All will rise when the Invocation is ON)
Chairman, Board of Governors declares 50th Convocation open
Distribution of degrees by the Chairman, Senate, to students (B.Tech., BS, M.Sc. (Integrated) and all dual degree (except M.Sc.-Ph.D. dual degree))
Exhortation by the Chairman, Senate
Presentation of medals and prizes by Chairman, Board of Governors
Presentation of citation (Honoris Causa) to A
Award of Doctor of Science (Honoris Causa) to A
Acceptance speech by A
Presentation of citation (Honoris Causa) to B
Award of Doctor of Science (Honoris Causa) to B
Acceptance speech by B
Institute Report by the Director
Introduction of the Chief guest by Chairman, Board of Governors
Convocation address by Chief Guest, Mr. Natarajan Chandrasekaran
Address by Chairman, Board of Governors
National Anthem
Chairman, Board of Governors declares the conclusion of Session-1 of 50th Convocation
Academic Procession leaves
Members of the BOG arrive at the venue. HoDs and Senators assemble in the green room at the backside of  Auditorium Hall
Arrival  of  the  Chief  Guest  (He  will  be  received  by  the  Director  and ushered for robing)
The Director will introduce the Chief Guest and the members of the BOG to HoDs and Senators
Academic Procession starts from the lobby of the Auditorium
Academic Procession enters the Convocation Hall
Invocation (All will rise when the Invocation is ON)
Chairman, Board of Governors declares the commencement of Session - 2 of the 50th Convocation open
Distribution of degrees to students by the Chairman, Senate (Ph.D., M.Tech., MS (Research), MBA, M. Des., M.Sc. (2-Year), M.Sc.-Ph. D (Dual Degree)).
Exhortation by the Chairman, Senate
Presentation of medals and prizes by Chairman, Board of Governors
Presentation of citation (Honoris Causa) to A
Award of Doctor of Science (Honoris Causa) to A
Acceptance speech by A
Presentation of citation (Honoris Causa) to B
Award of Doctor of Science (Honoris Causa) to B
Acceptance speech by B
Institute Report by the Director
Introduction of the Chief guest by Chairman, Board of Governors
Convocation address by Chief Guest, Dr. Clayton Daniel Mote, Jr.
Address by Chairman, Board of Governors
National Anthem
Chairman, Board of Governors declares the conclusion of the 50th Convocation
Academic Procession leaves
